name: nuclearmail
description: NuclearMail is an experiment of writing a webmail client using React and the Flux architecture. It runs completely in the browser and uses the GMail REST API.

scripts.watch-html: mkdirp build && nodemon --watch src/index.html --exec 'echo `cp src/index.html build/index.html`'
scripts.publish: npm run build && cp src/index.html build/index.html && git checkout gh-pages && cp build/* . && git commit -am 'Code update' && git push && git checkout master
scripts.start: npm run watch-html & npm run watch-js & npm run serve

author: Ian Obermiller
